summary: A U.S. marshal sets out to bring in a Mexican bandit accused of killing his girlfriend's father, but it turns out that there's more to the story than there first appears to be.
cast: Pernell Roberts|Sue Lyon|Julián Mateos|Leslie Nielsen|María Martín|Leonard Bell|John Clark|Charles Drace|Neil Wright|Janis Ian|Albert Salmi
keywords: spaghetti western|mexican bandit|u.s. marshal|mexican standoff|boyfriend girlfriend relationship
title: Cuatro cabalgaron
